subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Good Box...Bad Box
author: ej schott
full_text:
--0-1346349087-1185809358=:3317
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

LOL, Yes I agree-I haven't used the box, but do a lot of EVP work and have had my coffee grinder go off on its own, electronics randomly don't work and the garage door use to go up & down by itself.  Although nothing has fried, I go through a lot of lightbulbs and seem to go through appliance repair much more than the normal house (seems to be a hazzard of working with the "paranormal".  When my garage door would go up & down, I had to stand out there and tell them not to mess with it anymore, and though I felt like a crazy person, the garage door has functioned fine since.  So you can set some boundries, and it will work sometimes.  Interesting to see others having the same issues.
   


"umm.... yeah" ~ misc license plate
